sentences.sContent: He had surpassed all our expectations .
sentences.sCn: 他超越了我们所有的预期。

sentences.sContent: The number of multiple births has surpassed 100,000 for the first time.
sentences.sCn: 多胎产首次突破了 10 万例。

sentences.sContent: ...Now that women are the majority of college students and surpass men in both the number of undergraduate and advanced degrees awarded...

synos.tran: 超越；胜过，优于；非…所能办到或理解

words.tran: 可克服的；可超越的，可战胜的

trans.tranOther: to be even better or greater than someone or something else
